title: Rainbow Quinoa Salad
steps:
Cook quinoa and let it cool.

Chop all veggies finely.

Mix quinoa, veggies, corn, and chopped parsley.

Add olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

Toss well and serve chilled.

title: Creamy Vegan Tomato Soup
steps:
Roast tomatoes, garlic, and onion in olive oil.

Blend everything with coconut milk and basil.

Simmer for 10 mins, season, and serve hot.

title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
steps:
Toast the bread.

Smash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

Spread on toast and top with tomatoes, chili flakes, and microgreens.

title: Green Goddess Vegan Pasta
steps:
Cook pasta and set aside.

Blend spinach, avocado, garlic, lemon juice, basil, and olive oil.

Mix the sauce with warm pasta. Top with nutritional yeast.

title: Baked Sweet Potato Chips
steps:
Slice sweet potatoes thin.

Toss with olive oil and spices.

Bake at 180°C for 20-25 mins till crispy.

title: Coconut Veggie Rice
steps:
Cook veggies with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

Add rice and coconut milk.

Cook till fluffy and fragrant.

title: Chickpea Avocado Salad
steps:
Rinse chickpeas and chop avocado and veggies.

Mix all ingredients in a bowl.

Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil. Serve chilled.

title: Spicy Lentil Carrot Soup
steps:
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger.

Add carrots, lentils, and spices.

Pour broth and cook till soft. Blend and serve.

title: Tofu Scramble Breakfast Bowl
steps:
Crumble tofu and cook with olive oil and turmeric.

Add chopped veggies.

Cook until soft. Serve hot

title: Roasted Chickpea Snack Bites
steps:
Dry roast chickpeas.

Mix with oil and spices.

Bake at 200°C for 25 minutes.

title: Mushroom Spinach Brown Rice
steps:
Cook brown rice.

Sauté garlic, mushrooms, and spinach.

Add cooked rice and soy sauce, stir well.

title: Grilled Eggplant Rolls
steps:
Grill eggplant slices.

Spread hummus, fill with spinach & pepper.

Roll and grill again for 2 mins.

title: Vegan Chocolate Beet Brownies
steps:
Mix wet and dry ingredients.

Fold into a batter.

Bake at 180°C for 25-30 mins.
